title: 86: The Ultimate Snack Advice Episode
itunes:title: The Ultimate Snack Advice Episode
description: In today’s episode, Lisa shares her tips on how to snack right! Tips like how to choose the best protein bar, the best high-protein snacks (that aren’t bars), and advice for nighttime snacking. Plus, what to do when you can’t STOP snacking! And Lisa goes into detail about how intermittent fasting has helped her. This episode is a MUST-LISTEN for the snackers out there, so what are you waiting for?! Push play now. And when it’s over, check out our Foodcast page for a list of the products mentioned in the episode!
itunes:summary: Snacking can be tricky, but have no fear,  HG is here to help you make the best healthy snack choices!
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
